summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 1.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 126 m) and rainfall (down 1.4 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1712 m), rainfall (down 1.3 mm), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 126.5m lower than yesterday, 666.9m lower than the past week, 1712.5m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 940.5m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and near calm conditions. Drizzle or light rain possible, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dark. Weather could become unsettled.
